name: Damocles Destroyer
description: The Damocles Destroyer proved to be the better of the tier 5 destroyers. It has additional weapons and is able to equip infernal weapons for PvP combat unlike the Machete Destroyer. Was typically used in FvF fleets with the Covenant Cruiser and the Hellfire Battleship as well as basing fleets.
obtaining: Can be obtained in the Demon Corp campaign mission. Mk ups found in lv 60+ Vsec and Destroyer supply runs.
tips-builds: Typically used with Infernal Wave drivers as the weapon of choice for both FvF and FvB attacks. Though other options such as Infernal Gatling rays in FvF and Seige drivers for basing have been used.
author: Anonymous65
